metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0643 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.5.48 and earlier, 5.6.29 andearlier, and 5.7.11 and earlier and MariaDB before 5.5.49, 10.0.x before10.0.25, and 10.1.x before 10.1.14 allows local users to affectconfidentiality via vectors related to DML.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0643` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1
mysql-client - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1
mysql-common - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1
mysql-server - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-10.0 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-core-10.0 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test-data - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

percona-xtradb-cluster-server - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
percona-xtradb-cluster-server-5.6 - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
percona-xtradb-cluster-source-5.6 - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.12-0ubuntu1').
mariadb-10.0 package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-server-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
